snippet.title: LEGO® Star Wars™: Castaways - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
LEGO® Star Wars™: Castaways is the first online social, action-adventure LEGO Star Wars game on Apple Arcade where players can build and customize their own in-game LEGO minifigure. Team up with friends and explore unique activities on a hidden island, and explore Star Wars locations to uncover and solve mysteries, while collecting hundreds of LEGO Star Wars minifigure pieces to customize your character. In this Apple Arcade exclusive, players can join friends online and make their own character in a LEGO Star Wars world.
 
Play now on Apple Arcade! https://apps.apple.com/us/app/lego-star-wars-castaways/id1474344996?itsct=arcade_box_details&itscg=30200&at=1010l39ff&ct=lsw_yt
